1.title: Loading...

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: What if your life was a Video Game? Don DeWitt is an obsessed gamer pulled into an alternate reality where video games are real life.

2.title: Duty Calls

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Don finds himself a war-torn world surrounded on one side by a mysterious but beautiful woman and the hulking super soldier "The Sarge" and on the other Nazi's, Communists and Terrorists in the most awkward of alliances out to kill him. Time to First Person Shoot and questions later!

3.title: There Is No 'I' in Team Deathmatch

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Don comes up with a risky plan to try and take down the Sniper warlord known as "The NoobKiller". Kera and Sarge agree to the plan but there is definitely something wrong with Sarge; that guy has got some serious issues. Will the super-soldier be the team's wild card that brings them success or ruin?

4.title: Killstreaking

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: The final episode of the First Person Shooter arc comes to an explosive climax.

5.title: Righteous & Radical

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Don and Kera go to their first new world together. A world of bad-hair-bad clothes and bad people, travel back to the awesome 80s.

6.title: Beaten Up

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Some revelations about Kera's past come to light and Don's will to be a hero is pushed to the limit as he takes the fight to the streets.

7.title: My Body Is Ready

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Don's fears get the better of him, and he goes into full panic mode. But he soon meets a mysterious new person who might be able to get him home but is he friend or foe?

8.title: The Man with the Only Gun

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Don, Kera, the Brothers and their mutual girlfriend (yeah, it's weird - don't ask) go head to head with Big Adam in the ultimate showdown.

9.title: The Fortress

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: The heroes finally arrive back in Kera's world of Space Combat Simulation games. But before too long they're caught in a space invaders/asteroids like battle for survival against a rival starship.

10.title: Wing Commanding

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: With The Fortress in bad condition and unable to repair in time, Don and Kera hatch a daring plan to attach Danes assault vessel using fighter craft to buy some time.

11.title: Revelations

episode of.title: My Life as a Video Game (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: (SEASON FINALE) In the final episode of Season 1, Don and Kera find themselves pitted against their nemesis, the mysterious "Smoker" once more. But can they get over their own issues in time to fight back.

locations: Laurel Canyon Stages - 9337 Laurel Canyon Boulevard, Arleta, Los Angeles, California, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Don DeWitt's whole life revolves around gaming; from the way his room is decorated to his favourite bar called "Loading". One day he finds himself transported into an alternate reality where video games are real life. There he meets the deposed Princess Kera Althorn from a space empire, who travels from video game world to video game world recruiting each world's "Champions" to take back throne in her own world. Together, with Kera and her trusty Menu System, a cocky A.I. super computer who appears as a floating head on a holographic screen. They travel on an adventure that will take them across First Person Shooters, Side-Scrolling Beat 'Em Ups, Platformers, Fantasy RPGs, Space Combat Simulators and the whole spectrum of the video game universe to take back Kera's Empire and help Don find his way home... and his destiny.
imdb.title: My Life as a Video Game
akas: My Life as a Video Game (United Kingdom)
plot: A young gamer whose life revolves around the culture; one day finds himself pulled into an alternate reality where video games are real life. There he must fight his way across the various video game genres to find his way home.::Leon Films

Don DeWitt's whole life revolves around gaming; from the way his room is decorated to his favourite bar called "Loading". One day he finds himself transported into an alternate reality where video games are real life. There he meets the deposed Princess Kera Althorn from a space empire, who travels from video game world to video game world recruiting each world's "Champions" to take back throne in her own world. Together, with Kera and her trusty Menu System, a cocky A.I. super computer who appears as a floating head on a holographic screen. They travel on an adventure that will take them across First Person Shooters, Side-Scrolling Beat 'Em Ups, Platformers, Fantasy RPGs, Space Combat Simulators and the whole spectrum of the video game universe to take back Kera's Empire and help Don find his way home... and his destiny.::Leon Films
